name: Accept Operation
description: The accept operation assigns an e-prescription to a healthcare provider. The status of the referenced Task changes into 'in-progres'.

parameter.name: ac
parameter.documentation: The Operation gets inside the URL an Paramter ?ac. This paramter must be equal to the value stored in Task.identifier:AccessCode. Otherwise the Operation aborts with an error.

parameter.name: Task
parameter.documentation: Output of this Operation is the updated Task. The status of the Task changes into in-progres. The prescription server creates a random number and stores it in Task.identifier:Secret. The Task ressource gets stored in Task.input.
